review: Very easy to use and does everything I need it to!
author: Brianna

review: Best TV stick I tried so far.
author: Bashar Daher

review: I absolutely love my Fire TV Stick!  Came with my account info already installed. Took 5 minutes to get it up and running.
author: Roseann DEVASTO

review: Love having this on my tv.  I have a smart tv with no gaming system.  This little usb drive fits very well in the back of the tv.  This allows me to watch Netlix, Amazon, Showtime and HBO all with 1 remote and 1 system!  I do find using the stick to access HBO or Showtime is slower then when accessing those apps directly.
author: Angie Morris

review: I am really enjoying my fire TV stick.  It is so much nicer to watch movies on the big screen.  I had a little trouble hooking up the stick since I only had  I had to purchase an extra hookup which held more outlets.
author: Judy Holmes

review: Our TV has become smart with this Stick! We can watch Netflix and play games!
author: Jono "Jono"
